definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The proportion of coking gas oil (CGO) in total liquid product produced from theonce through operation was increased but the quality became worse.
sentences.chinese: 但单程焦化蜡油占液体产物的比例增加，且质量更差。

sentences.english: Advanced treatment of coking wastewater by iron-carbon micro-electrolysis process with aeration was studied.
sentences.chinese: 采用曝气铁炭微电解工艺对焦化废水进行了深度处理。

sentences.english: The by-product gas of producing of traditional coking technique belongs to the gas of easy burning.
sentences.chinese: 传统焦化工艺产生的副产品煤气属易燃气体。

sentences.english: This article introduced the commissioning experience of crude benzol-escaping air recovery system.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了焦化厂粗苯放散气体回收系统开工调试的经验。

sentences.english: The rare-earth salt is a special activator of activated sludge.
sentences.chinese: 稀土盐是焦化废水活性污泥一特殊激活剂。

sentences.english: The research on permeability and separation of coking wastewater by means of new type of tubular porous carbon membrane for was made.
sentences.chinese: 用新型管状炭膜对焦化废水进行了渗透分离研究。

sentences.english: The newly-founded isotope device in this coking factory accords with the national standard.
sentences.chinese: 结论该焦化厂新装同位素装置场所基本符合国家规定。

sentences.english: At present, the treatment of coking waste water with AAO process has been promoted.
sentences.chinese: 目前，AAO法处理焦化污水已在全国推广。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the application of centralized and decentralized control system in the production process of diggings coking plant.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了集散控制系统在矿区焦化厂生产过程中的应用。

sentences.english: And belong to a clean cooking crude benzole purificatory device.
sentences.chinese: 而且属于一条干干净净的焦化粗苯精制装置。

sentences.english: The second demand is for metallurgical, or coking, coal.
sentences.chinese: 第二种是对于冶金煤或者说焦化煤的需求。

sentences.english: That benefits both effectivenesses in society and economy for carbonization plant.
sentences.chinese: 焦化厂的社会效益与经济效益获得很大提高。

sentences.english: Flame arrester device is installed in the coking of oil storage tanks on the important safety equipment.
sentences.chinese: 阻火器设备是安装于焦化石油储罐上的重要安全设备。

sentences.english: The experience of Coke Plant, Xingtai Iron and Steel Company to conduct systematic management on its coal field is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了邢钢焦化厂对其贮煤场实施系统管理的经验。

sentences.english: The causes for deterioration of heat conducting oil were analyzed, and the countermeasures and its effects were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 分析了焦化厂导热油变质原因，介绍整改措施与效果。

sentences.english: The method of removal of thiophene in coking benzene and lightbenzene by chloromethylation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用氯甲基化脱除焦化苯及轻苯中噻吩的方法。

definition: coking/the process of producing coke from coal
coke (processed coal used in blast furnace)
chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
to roll steel (into sheets or bars)
